document_data.name: Rusty Nail
document_data.mainbody: The '''Rusty Nail''' was the largest inn to be found in the [[Hillsfar Docks|dock section]] of [[Hillsfar]] around [[1367 DR]]. Since it was located outside of the walled city it was perfectly legal for the inn to cater to [[adventurer]]s.
document_data.Location: The inn was situated on the coast of the [[Moonsea (lake)|Moonsea]] near the main docks.
document_data.Services: A bed and meal at the Rusty Nail cost 6 [[gp]] per night but that price did not include [[ale]].
